REUTERS.UNKNOWN: RM f0357 reute r f BC-SPAIN'S-MONEY-SUPPLY 03-11 0079

TEXT.TITLE: SPAIN'S MONEY SUPPLY GROWTH DOUBLES IN FEBRUARY
TEXT.BODY: Spain's broad based M-4 money supply rose at an annualised rate of 16.7 pct in February against 8.1 pct in January and 22.4 pct in February last year, Bank of Spain figures show. The broad-based money supply is measured as liquid assets in public hands plus quasi-monetary assets. Money supply growth was 11.4 pct last year. The government wants to reduce the rate to eight pct this year. REUTER
